host.description: The binding address of your server

players.description: The amount of players that can play on your server concurrently

password.description: The password required to join your server

announce.description: If the server should be visible on the masterlist in the alt:V client

token.description: Token to announce the server to the masterlist (not needed for development or direct connect)

gamemode.description: The gamemode your server is running

debug.description: If the debug mode should be allowed (Debug mode allows debugging functions like reconnect or the CEF debugger)

streamingDistance.description: The stream in distance for entities (players, vehicles)

migrationDistance.description: The network owner migration distance for entities (vehicles)

announceRetryErrorDelay.description: The delay that is used when the announceRetryErrorAttempts are reached (in ms)

announceRetryErrorAttempts.description: Max retries until announceRetryErrorDelay will be used

duplicatePlayers.description: Max players which can connect with the same ip address

mapBoundsMinX.description: The map bound size (value is considered negative)

mapBoundsMinY.description: The map bound size (value is considered negative)

mapBoundsMaxX.description: The map bound size (value is considered positive)

mapBoundsMaxY.description: The map bound size (value is considered positive)

mapCellAreaSize.description: smaller areas uses more ram and less cpu

colShapeTickRate.description: Defines the rate (miliseconds) in which colshape calculations should occur (dev/13.0-dev32 and higher)
